IRCClient - Class in org.ece542.Client
Creates new IRCClient object with socket and 2 threads for simultaneous reading from and writing to server
IRCClient(String, int) - Constructor for class org.ece542.Client.IRCClient
Effects: Constructor for IRCClient
IRCreadingThread - Class in org.ece542.Client
IRCreadingThread is used to listen to server broadcast messages and displaying on client's terminal until connection is closed.
IRCreadingThread(IRCClient) - Constructor for class org.ece542.Client.IRCreadingThread
Constructor for the reading thread.
IRCwritingThread - Class in org.ece542.Client
IRCwritingThread class will be used for listening for user keyboard input and sending the user message to the server.
IRCwritingThread(IRCClient) - Constructor for class org.ece542.Client.IRCwritingThread
Effects: attaches user input to client's socket output stream
